description: It was a beautiful day to just hang out by the pool. Aiden decided to lay out and work on his tan. But it seems his mom forgot to tell him that the pool boy was coming over. AJ showed up ready to work. But when the pool was clean and it was time to get paid, Aiden did not have the form of payment that AJ was accustomed to. Aiden offered up himself as payment, which AJ did not seem to mind at all. It did not take long for them to get some hot sucking started. They took turns blowing each other, which then led to some steamy anal. In the end warm man goo was shot all over and AJ was the new permanent pool boy.
title: The Real Steele
